name: kill 2 leave(demo1)(beta)
description:
kill 2 leave is action adventure game set in a medieval theme.

this game is heavily inspired by games like god of war and dark souls 

this demo shows you how the gameplay is like and how good are the graphics

this demo doesn't  have ui and any story element

we tried our best to develop a demo without  revealing the story

remember this demo showcases character which are just placeholder and which aren't the final characters(protaganist,enemy,bosses)
